title: Highest Fossil Fuel Energy Consumption
description: In 2022, Azerbaijan had a fossil fuel energy consumption rate of 100% of its total energy consumption, the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Prevalence of Tobacco Use Among Females
description: In 2022, only 0.1% of female adults in Azerbaijan were current tobacco users, the lowest prevalence in the world.

title: Lowest Adequacy of Social Insurance Programs
description: In 2015, the adequacy of social insurance programs in Azerbaijan was only 0.24% of the total welfare of beneficiary households, the lowest in the world.
